bug.author: javismiles
bug.summary: streamlit on WSL in windows, running script always shows the demo on browser
bug.description: Good day, I am using streamlist on WSL Ubuntu on windows, installation went perfect. Then I create a hello.py with some code following your tutorial, then do streamlit run hello.py, and instead of getting the result of the code, I get the streamlit demo page again on localhost:8501, it always shows the demo, regardless of what script I run, thank you

comments.comment: solved, I was running streamlit twice in vscode and shell
